video.title: Twitch Plays(Viewers play/Chat plays) Paper Mario TTYD on an actual Wii Day 27, Hour 12 to Hour 24, type !help to learn how to play(PART 51)

commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 12 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

message.body: !help

fragments.text: !help

message.body: @WhatAboutGamingLive Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Z, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (Analog Stick), Cup, Cdown, Cleft, Cright (C Stick), and Dup, Ddown, Dleft, Dright, (D Pad). Typos work too!

fragments.text: @WhatAboutGamingLive Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Z, Start (Buttons and triggers), Up, Down, Left, Right (Analog Stick), Cup, Cdown, Cleft, Cright (C Stick), and Dup, Ddown, Dleft, Dright, (D Pad). Typos work too!

message.body: Up to 4 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Cright will press the B Button, pull Up on the Analog Stick and pull Right on the C Stick. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both pull Left on the Analog Stick.

fragments.text: Up to 4 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Cright will press the B Button, pull Up on the Analog Stick and pull Right on the C Stick. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both pull Left on the Analog Stick.

message.body: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times.

fragments.text: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 266 milliseconds then wait for another 266 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 256 times.

message.body: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+Z+Down;1000 *5 Will pull Up and Right on the Analog Stick and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and Z Buttons and pull Down on the Analog Stick for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

fragments.text: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+Z+Down;1000 *5 Will pull Up and Right on the Analog Stick and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and Z Buttons and pull Down on the Analog Stick for 1000 milliseconds (1 second), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

message.body: You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

fragments.text: You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

fragments.text: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 266 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.
